mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_info (pi_name, pi_cate_seq, pi_stock, pi_si_seq, pi_discount_rate, pi_caution, pi_weight, pi_point_rate, pi_di_seq, pi_price, pi_img_uri) VALUES(#{pi_name}, #{pi_cate_seq}, #{pi_stock}, #{pi_si_seq}, #{pi_discount_rate}, #{pi_caution}, #{pi_weight}, #{pi_point_rate}, #{pi_di_seq}, #{pi_price}, #{pi_img_uri});
INSERT INTO prod_image (pimg_file_name, pimg_uri, pimg_size) VALUES (#{pimg_file_name}, #{pimg_uri}, #{pimg_size});
mapper.select: select pimg_file_name from prod_image where pimg_uri = #{uri} order by pimg_seq desc limit 1
